I am a first year MPhil/PhD student in Statistics at the London School of Economics and Political Science; I am part of the Time Series and Statistical Learning research group, and my supervisor is Professor Piotr Fryzlewicz. Some of my research interests include:

  • High dimensional time series analysis
  • Causal inference in data rich environments
  • Algorithms for dynamic network analysis
  • Clever uses of trees and forests
